alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LANCASTER AND EAST CENTRAL YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 645 PM EDT... At 615 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Columbia, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Columbia, Millersville, Willow Street, Paradise, Strasburg, Mountville, Quarryville, Wrightsville, Windsor, Yorkana, Brogue, Smithville, Holtwood, Shenks Ferry, Safe Harbor, Lampeter, Intercourse, Conestoga and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for south central Pennsylvania.
